content.raw:
With the current structure, #!/osrf/gazebo/src/d30e8e62572ec46cd6e12f5f07d0a98d16a4a9b7/gazebo/sensors/RaySensor.hh?at=default#cl-123 will still report DBL_MAX as previous.

The actual change occurs at the UpdateImpl level, where instead of clamping, I mask to DBL_INF - this is documented inline. Would you prefer a note in the header for UpdateImpl? I didn't think that would be the best place.
